features.name: Flesh of Stone
features.description: While you are not bloodied, any critical hit made against you counts as a normal hit.

features.name: Slam
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Shove
features.description: Save: DC 13 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: Target is pushed 10 ft.

features.name: Tackle
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage and the target is knocked prone.

features.name: Curse of Stone
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs CHA, range 15 ft., one target you can see. Hit: The target is Slowed >> Restrained >> Controlled (escape DC 14 vs CHA).
